bibl.title: Chartae Latinae Antiquiores. Facsimile-Edition of the Latin Charters Prior to the Ninth Century. Part VI. The United States of America II.
bibl.note: Ch.L.A. VI, 309-321. - New Haven, Yale University (P. Dura).
bibl.seg: Bruckner Albert and Robert Marichal, Chartae Latinae Antiquiores. Facsimile-Edition of the Latin Charters Prior to the Ninth Century. Part VI. The United States of America II.
Dietikon - Zürich, Urs Graf Verlag, 1975, in fol., vi-98 pp., ill.
Ch.L.A. VI, 309-321. - New Haven, Yale University (P. Dura).

C.R. par Ettore Cau, Scriptorium 31 (1977) pp. 302-304 (concerne aussi Ch.L.A. V et VII). - Armando Petrucci, Gnomon 51 (1979) pp. 26-31 (concerne Ch.L.A. V-VIII). - Günter Poethke, ArchPF 26 (1978) p. 132 (concerne Ch.L.A. VI-VIII).
